rows.label: qst700102_msg0002
rows.name:
Teeco sent you? Tch, that girl...
I told her it was nothing.

rows.label: qst700102_msg0003
rows.name:
...Look, the truth is, I
let three of the Armu I was
looking after get away.

rows.label: qst700102_msg0004
rows.name:
It's my own stupid fault. I
wanted to see if Armu had a
homing instinct or something...

rows.label: qst700102_msg0005
rows.name:
I just never thought that none
of them would come back.

rows.label: qst700102_msg0006
rows.name:
Um... look... if you see
them out there, could you
bring them back here for me?

rows.label: qst700102_msg0007
rows.name:
If you can find their tracks,
you should be able to figure
out which way they went.

rows.label: qst700102_msg0008
rows.name:
The three that went missing are
Yonma, Ajijii, and Iwashisshi.

rows.label: qst700102_msg0009
rows.name:
They'll respond if you call their
names, so please, don't go attacking
them, okay? I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst700102_msg0101
rows.name:
If you see my Armu out there, I
need you to bring them back here.

rows.label: qst700102_msg0102
rows.name:
You might still find tracks near
the town entrance. Following them
might show you where they went.

rows.label: qst700102_msg0103
rows.name:
The three that are missing are named
Yonma, Ajijii, and Iwashisshi.

rows.label: qst700102_msg0104
rows.name:
They'll respond if you call their
names, so please, don't attack
them, okay? I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst700102_msg0201
rows.name:
Haa... The stable feels so empty
when they're not all here...

rows.label: qst700102_msg0202
rows.name:
Please, find my Armu for me.
They must be so lonely out
there all by themselves.
